name: Lonely Christmas
description:
A brief atmospheric experience-game telling the story of a lonely old man on Christmas eve.

The project compiles a series of sound and visual effects meant to create a highly palpable and immersive atmosphere in an unrealistically portrayed world.

The artstyle consists of lowpoly models, with low resolution textures, all rendered with a scaled down resolution for a nice retro look.

Current file is just a playable demo, with no story and no savable progress. The game is currently being further developed.
